comments.author: Anonymous
comments.body: Forget about bending it like Beckham; I want to bend it like Honda! Wow!

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Glad to see MB has the Mitty bug in him. I'm also glad he's messing w/ the Frenz on a regular basis. As for me, I trotted up the 4 Pines trail onto the Mesa trail, then back down through Chautauqua. It _is_ beautiful up there right now. I've never seen the grass so tall. Nothing like being on a cheap Coumadin high to really get you in tune w/ nature.
